column4: Well, I have a fairly powerful system (AMD Athlon 64X2 6000+ w/ 4gigs RAM), but I get sluggish response and delay from a lot of applications.  How would I go about finding the causes for this?
you'll laugh when i say this.   but;  too much ram.
hrmm... you're right, I'll need more explaining for that one.  Unless you mean that I have more than I need and not that the extra RAM is actually causing the problem
more than 2g can cause slower response time   but i'm not sure why.
